name: Valentine Crush - Match the Hearts
description:
Match candy hearts, gems, and rings in this lovely Valentine adventure!

Exciting Features:
▶ Easy to play, but challenging to master.
▶ Over 300 addicting levels, with more being added!
▶ Unlock free rewards.
▶ Challenge friends and other players through Game Center.
▶ Enjoy all year round!

Download for FREE! *Limited time only.*
